title: Fix IntegrationTests CS compilation errors (API breaking changes)
Fix SA1018 nullable type spacing errors in Infrastructure project
Fix failing Infrastructure.Tests
notes:
Infrastructure.Tests builds successfully (0 errors) after analyzer fixes, but 26 tests are failing:

Categories of failures:
1. SoftDeleteInterceptorTests (13 failures) - Database entities not being soft-deleted properly
2. ControlPlaneExtensionsTests (4 failures) - Missing ILogger<ControlPlaneDbContext> registration
3. SecurityConfigurationValidatorTests (4 failures) - Weak secret validation logic issues
4. ApiKeyServiceTests (2 failures) - Error message text mismatches
5. TenantResolutionMiddlewareTests (1 failure) - Mock verification issue
6. IdentityManagerTests (1 failure) - Null token issue
7. CopilotSdkClientTests (1 failure) - Dispose not called

These are pre-existing test failures unrelated to the analyzer fixes.
Build: ✅ (0 errors, 0 warnings)
Tests: ❌ (26 failures)
